import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css' import { useState } from 'react'; import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form'; import Random from './components/Random'; import './App.css'; import './index.css'; function App() { let [x, setx] = useState(Random()); let y = ""; for (let i = 0; i < x.length; i++) { y += "*"; } let [alpha, setAlpha] = useState(y); let [num, setNum] = useState(5); let [flag, setFlag] = useState(-1); const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors } } = useForm(); let onFormsubmit = (obj) => { if ((x).indexOf(obj.abc) > -1) { for (let i = 0; i < x.length; i++) { if (x[i] == obj.abc) { alpha = alpha.substring(0, i) + obj.abc + alpha.substring(i + 1); } } setFlag(1); setAlpha(alpha); } else { setNum(num - 1); setFlag(0); } } return (
